title: Tell No One
writer: Guillaume Canet, Harlan Coben (novel), Philippe Lefebvre
actors: François Cluzet, Marie-Josée Croze, André Dussollier, Kristin Scott Thomas
plot: Police find two bodies at an old murder scene and evidence to suggest the first victim's husband is a murderer. The husband receives clues suggesting his deceased wife is actually alive and begins to investigate.
